data.about:
I'm a personal development and technology enthusiast, project leader, coach and visual creator.

I define myself as " the energy that connects with you and multiplies your impact." 

After over 15 years in banking transformation, a failed startup and two wonderful kids, I have realized the importance of relationships and people development for the success of any project, professional and personal. 

I strive to develop relationships and teams, building something valuable in every project. 

I often acted as a liaison between the IT team and the business areas, managed complex projects and cross-functional teams, and interacted with top executives and stakeholders. I was integration director during the biggest M&A deal in the financial system in Spain.

I have always been and still am a very action and goal-oriented person, always in motion, always trying to improve everything.

This is what led me to become a co-active coach and a big believer in changing the ways of work for the better.

I am organized, analytical, decisive, and highly autonomous, and developed the skills to be an effective team leader, internal consultant, and change management champion. I have a deep knowledge of performance management, data analytics, MIS, new technologies, and digital transformation projects.
data.company_description:
We are the leading financial group in the Spanish market, comprised of banking business, insurance activity and investments in international banks and leading companies in the services sector.
CaixaBank is a financial group with a socially responsible, long-term universal banking model, based on quality, trust, and specialisation, which offers a value proposition of products and services adapted for each sector, adopting innovation as a strategic challenge and a distinguishing feature of its corporate culture, and whose leading position in retail banking in Spain and Portugal makes it a key player in supporting sustainable economic growth.

educations.degree: Leadership Skills for the Digital Age

experiences.description:
Leading cross-functional service and quality management initiatives and driving innovation as an active member of the bank's change makers group. My role focuses on enhancing both external and internal customer experiences through strategic project leadership and fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation across the organization.

Notable accomplishments:

•	Leading projects to improve internal and external customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

•	Leading initiatives to advance key issues for various business areas, ensuring broad organizational impact through strategic project management.

•	Active member of the change makers group, promoting agile methodologies and new ways of work throughout the organization.

•	Key contributor to the deployment of Microsoft Copilot and generative AI technologies, serving as a primary reference inside the business area.

•	Providing expert guidance and support to colleagues across departments, fostering a collaborative environment for problem-solving and innovation.

•	Facilitating knowledge sharing and best practices and innovation across different teams and departments. Service excellence manager and changemaker Mar 2024 - Present · 1 yr 4 mos
experiences.skills: Leadership · Interpersonal Communication · Project Management · Change Management · Conflict Management · Cross-functional Team Leadership
experiences.title: Service excellence manager and changemaker

experiences.description:
Reporting to the Business Integration Director (who in turn reports to the General Manager) and managing a team of up to six consultants, my role is ensuring the coordination and execution of cross-cut projects, to support the different areas of the bank in the biggest merger of the Spanish financial system, and in strategic transformational projects in the business area, after the merger. 

Notable accomplishments:

•	Management of the PMO team to launch a new business segment in the bank and open 73 specialized branches.

•	Designing, planning, and coordination of a restructuring plan for the commercial workforce and retail customers portfolio.

•	Orchestration of the support structure for a customer process digitization task force of 2.000+ people: planning, commercial tools, reporting.

•	Coordination of a team of data scientists through an M&A clean team, to elaborate a segmentation of the customer base.

•	Compilation, analysis and drafting of responses to the regulator requirements, in order to obtain the authorization of the merger. 

•	Compilation, analysis, presentation and follow-up of initiatives to capture revenue synergies. Integration Director
experiences.skills: Public Speaking · Negotiation · Management Consulting · SQL · Interpersonal Communication · Microsoft Outlook · Microsoft Word · Leadership · Cross-functional Team Leadership · Business Acumen · Insurance · Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) · Analytical Skills · Stakeholder Management · Spanish · Team Leadership · Microsoft PowerPoint · Conflict Management · Performance Management · Python · Project Management · Change Management · Management
experiences.title: Integration Director

experiences.description:
In a division reporting to the General Manager and leading a team of up to twelve people, I define every aspect of the performance management and commercial MIS. Multi year planning, annual objectives, KPI, incentives, business analytics and reporting. I lead new technology deployments and participate in company-wide organizational change management programs.

Notable accomplishments:

•	Market analysis, alternatives assessment, stakeholder coordination and RFP approval for a new company-wide planning platform.

•	Requirements definition, planning and execution of an IT project for a sales force incentive and performance management tool.

•	Definition and implementation of a department datawarehouse based in ORACLE SQL, and analytics tool in both OBIEE and QlickSense

•	Requirements definition, planning and execution of an IT project for a company-wide customer portfolio management tool.

•	Acted as change agent for business model transformations, coordinating business, support areas, and workforce regional managers.

•	Orchestration of the business development support structure for a workforce restructuring and the creation of the SME Banking division.

•	Coordination of cross-functional team for setting annual goals, in close collaboration with the Finance and HR team. 

•	Development of analytics models to allocate sales quotas to branches, assessing alternatives for each KPI and choosing the best model.

•	Definition and implementation of new performance management KPIs for the retail workforce, linked to the incentive systems.

•	Managing and maintaining the retail workforce performance KPI: more than fifty sales and earnings variables.

•	Data analysis, variable selection, monthly execution, automation and qualitative review of scorecard for the General Management.

•	Monthly review of results, gap analysis and forecast update. Automation of the technical components of the forecast. Performance Management Director
experiences.skills: Business Intelligence · Public Speaking · SQL · Interpersonal Communication · Data Analysis · Microsoft Outlook · Microsoft Word · Leadership · Business Development · Cross-functional Team Leadership · Business Planning · Technology Integration · Insurance · Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) · Analytical Skills · Stakeholder Management · Spanish · Team Leadership · Microsoft PowerPoint · Conflict Management · Performance Management · Project Management · Change Management · Management
experiences.title: Performance Management Director

experiences.description: Guest professor in the Master in Internet Business, on the topic of "leadership in the digital world"
experiences.title: Guest Professor

experiences.description:
As a dedicated Transformation Coach, I am passionate about empowering individuals to broaden their horizons, step beyond their comfort zones, and grow. I facilitate a deeper understanding of one's life journey and support individuals in designing their life path according to their unique values, goals and aspirations.

I help my clients rediscover their courage, their inner strengths, encouraging them to become the person they aspire to be and create the life they envision. Through a dynamic, personalized coaching process, I provide the tools and strategies necessary to start a transformation, fostering self-discovery, resilience, and a renewed sense of purpose.
experiences.title: Coach

experiences.description:
I am a visual illustrator and the editor of a weekly newsletter specializing in personal development, innovation, management, and leadership. I curate the best resources from these domains and synthesize articles to bring the main ideas to life through visual representations.

Through this experience and by creating more than nine hundred illustrations, I developed strong visual communication skills, creating engaging and effective visual representations of complex ideas and a deep understanding of how the main social media platforms work in terms of content distribution and engagement.
experiences.title: Visual illustrator and weekly newsletter editor

experiences.description: In collaboration with the management of the acceleration programs, my role is to collaborate with startups in the growth phase. I support entrepreneurs by sharing with them conversations, knowledge and reflections on business development, finance and sales.
experiences.skills: Interpersonal Communication · Microsoft Outlook · Microsoft Word · Business · Entrepreneurship · Coaching · Business Strategy · Spanish · Microsoft PowerPoint · Performance Management · Management
experiences.title: Business Mentor

experiences.description:
In collaboration with the founder of the company and directly managing all technical service providers, my role is to make available to the company all the financial, technical and IT means to ensure the day-to-day management of the business.

Notable accomplishments:

•	Market analysis, financial projections and coordination with a consulting firm to apply for a non dilutive loan.

•	Website design, restyling, evaluation of alternatives, monitoring and continuous improvements.

•	Digital marketing campaigns: definition of objectives, coordination with consultants in planning and execution.

•	IT and finance services: needs analysis, selection, and maintenance, document and accounting management.
experiences.skills: Negotiation · Agile Methodologies · Interpersonal Communication · Microsoft Outlook · Microsoft Word · E-commerce · Leadership · Business Development · Business Planning · Business Acumen · Remote Workforce Management · Technology Integration · Online Marketing · Entrepreneurship · Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) · Business Strategy · Strategic Planning · Spanish · Microsoft PowerPoint · Conflict Management · Project Management · Management
experiences.title: Co-founder and CTO

experiences.description:
I have experience operating a crypto mining farm, where I managed the mining process for various cryptocurrencies, including Ethereum, Bitcoin, and Monero. This involved setting up and maintaining mining hardware, configuring software, troubleshooting technical issues, and optimizing mining performance to achieve maximum profitability. 

Through this experience, I developed a deep understanding of the underlying blockchain technology and the mechanics of cryptocurrency mining. I am adept at analyzing market trends and adjusting mining strategies accordingly to ensure optimal returns. My experience in crypto mining has given me valuable skills in problem-solving, data analysis, and technical proficiency.
experiences.title: Crypto mining farm operator

experiences.description:
I start working as a performance management data analyst, then become head of a three people team. My role consists of setting the objectives for the workforce, developing the measurement systems, analyzing the data and prepare the performance reports for high executives.

Notable accomplishments:

•	Definition and allocation of annual commercial objectives to the sales force.

•	Definition of requirements, monthly execution and qualitative review of the scorecard for the business areas.

data.headline: Grow and learn with me: personal development, leadership, innovation. I am a project leader, coach, and visual creator, and I share all I learn through my posts and newsletter.
